column4: Can anyone tell me if its possible (advisable) to install 2 different GWM's (eg - Gnome and xfce), and choose which to use at boot time?
people do it all the time, they choose at the login screen
simply install xfce4 , then when you are at the login screen:  hit the options button, then session and choose
no, I'm not sure, but I would think so.
